mapper.insert: INSERT INTO maoyan_cinema( id, nm, addr, lat, lng, area, deal, distance, sell, sell_price, imax, sellmin, deal_price, follow, dis, preferential, ct, reference_price, show_count, brd, brd_id, poi_id ) values( #{id}, #{nm}, #{addr}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{area}, #{deal}, #{distance}, #{sell}, #{sellPrice}, #{imax}, #{sellmin}, #{dealPrice}, #{follow}, #{dis}, #{preferential}, #{ct}, #{referencePrice}, #{showCount}, #{brd}, #{brdId}, #{poiId} )

INSERT INTO maoyan_cinema( id, nm, addr, lat, lng, area, deal, distance, sell, sell_price, imax, sellmin, deal_price, follow, dis, preferential, ct, reference_price, show_count, brd, brd_id, poi_id ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.nm}, #{item.addr}, #{item.lat}, #{item.lng}, #{item.area}, #{item.deal}, #{item.distance}, #{item.sell}, #{item.sellPrice}, #{item.imax}, #{item.sellmin}, #{item.dealPrice}, #{item.follow}, #{item.dis}, #{item.preferential}, #{item.ct}, #{item.referencePrice}, #{item.showCount}, #{item.brd}, #{item.brdId}, #{item.poiId} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, nm, addr, lat, lng, area, deal, distance, sell, sell_price, imax, sellmin, deal_price, follow, dis, preferential, ct, reference_price, show_count, brd, brd_id, poi_id FROM `maoyan_cinema` WHERE id = #{_parameter}
SELECT id, nm, addr, lat, lng, area, deal, distance, sell, sell_price, imax, sellmin, deal_price, follow, dis, preferential, ct, reference_price, show_count, brd, brd_id, poi_id FROM `maoyan_cinema`
